sense.def:
The source of something
je oseba, kraj ali stvar, iz katere nekaj dobimo.

seg.quote: ...one of the world's main sources of uranium.
Candidates are required to publish the sources of their campaign funds.

sense.def:
The source of a difficulty
je vzrok težave.

seg.quote: They're trying to trace the source of the trouble.

sense.def:
A source of information
je oseba ali knjiga, od katere oziroma iz katere dobimo podatek.

seg.quote: Western diplomatic sources confirmed reports of fighting in the capital.
The story was based on information from a ‘reliable source’.

sense.def:
The source of a river or stream
je kraj, kjer se reka ali potok začenja.

seg.quote: We are following the creek to its source.
